scripts.publish:build: snowpack build && shx cp .nojekyll build/ && git add . && git commit -m WIP && git push
scripts.publish:push: git checkout -b gh-pages && git push -f --set-upstream origin gh-pages && git checkout master && git branch -D gh-pages
scripts.publish: npm run publish:build && npm run publish:push
scripts.test: echo "This template does not include a test runner by default." && exit 1
